alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:19PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain... ...This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton.... * WHAT...Showers and thunderstorms with locally heavy rain and gusty wind. Rainfall of one half inch to 1 inch possible in a short period of time. Small hail is possible with stronger storms. * WHERE...Teton County...including Wilson, Teton Village, Alta, Jackson Airport, Jackson, Teton Pass, and Togwotee Pass. * WHEN...Until 830 PM MDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Flooding of low lying areas will be possible. Some roadways may see localized flooding. Do not drive into flooded areas. Frequent lightning is also occurring with these storms. Seek shelter in a sturdy building, if possible.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
